data.message: Hey, if you like the song Bad Guy, come check out this fan made music video and see the story come to life. Filming took over a month and involved a trip to #detroit and digging a ditch. Watch::https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=Ch8bpvPk3Ek be sure to leave some feedback and share it with your Stans and Fans

replies.message: If you have heard his earlier music then you dont need a video because it explains itself yo
Brian Dickinson it's not about explanation, it's about showing appreciation through a different art form, and it's an interesting story to follow up on 😄
you made this? this is awesome work man!
you should make a last verse one as well that'll be insane! Real dark n shit too
My boyfriend made it, and he really appreciates your comment!
